---
title: "Infrastructure Packages"
---

<div id="category-packages" data-category="infrastructure"></div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  const container = document.getElementById('category-packages');
  try {
    const response = await fetch('/data/categories/infrastructure.json');
    if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load');
    const data = await response.json();

    container.innerHTML = `
      <p class="results-count">Found ${data.packages.length} packages</p>
      <div class="package-list">
        ${data.packages.slice(0, 50).map(pkg => `
          <div class="package-card">
            <div class="package-header">
              <h3 class="package-title">
                <a href="${pkg.repository || pkg.url || '#'}" target="_blank">${pkg.package_name}</a>
              </h3>
              <span class="package-score">${pkg.score ? pkg.score.toFixed(1) : 'N/A'}</span>
            </div>
            <p class="package-description">${pkg.title || 'No description'}</p>
          </div>
        `).join('')}
      </div>
    `;
  } catch (e) {
    container.innerHTML = '<p>Unable to load packages. <a href="index.qmd">Browse all categories</a>.</p>';
  }
});
</script>
